title: Does anyone feel we need Death Fire Touch back as a keystone?
body: for a proper damage rune for mages, namely because meteor is shit, and there is lack of diversity for poke champs.

replies.body:
Why not bring Deathfire Grasp back?

RIP DFG 2009 - 2015 </3

Nah, it was boring, totally uninteractive, and just more dmg on whatever you casted.

> [{quoted}](name=Step Sis Lux,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hIwHriYB,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-08T13:15:16.882+0000)

> we already have scorch and this is like death fire   touch so i dont think we gonna get this

Easy, remove scorch and replace it with something else (maybe the new Nimbus rune) and give us Death Fire Touch for real as a keystone
When ever I take scortch I can't even notice it being proc'ed and the difference between Scorch and Deathfire Touch is that there was no cooldown whereas Scorch has a 20 second cooldown.

Comet isn't bad, it just isn't that great on champions who can't slow you. It's a particularly niche rune, and unfortunately Aery isn't that impressive on mages either and Phase Rush is just... not good at all.
Mages really do need some kind of rune that fits them better in "their" tree that's a lot less niche.
